keyword: how many calories are in a reeses
title: How Many Calories Are in a Reese's?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Reese's?
assumptions: Standard single Reese's Peanut Butter Cup (21g), milk chocolate with creamy peanut butter filling; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, flavor variant, brand batch, and storage; always check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard Reese's Peanut Butter Cup contains about 110 calories and 2g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup?
faqs.a: One standard cup has about 110 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a Reese's?
faqs.a: Per cup: 8g fat, 12g carbs (10g sugars), 2g protein.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in one Reese's?
faqs.a: About 10g of sugars per standard Peanut Butter Cup.

faqs.q: How do calories differ in Reese's varieties?
faqs.a: King size doubles to ~220 kcal; pieces or minis vary by countâ€”check labels.
